title: 40 Days and 40 Nights of Fasting
description: 40 Days and Nights of Fasting is a true life event of the author. The book follows the author 40 days and 40 nights of liquid fasting. One day Mya was crying out to Jesus requesting a change in her life. Jesus told her to fast for 40 days and 40 nights then she will receive all her answers and more. And she did. During her fast, she experienced temptation, self discovery, deliverance, strength, and understanding.
author: Mya Sanders
